name: Simple Classic Solitaire Plus
description:
Play the best free classical game - Simple Classic Solitaire Plus (also knowns as Klondike Patience Solitaire). Solitare (Patience) is the most popular card game and it's extremely addictive.

We made sure our version of Kondoke Solitaire is simple and pleasant. Just start playing and immerse yourself into addictive world of Solitare!

It's our the best game and it's a must play! Unleash your logic! And it's FREE.

Solitaire Features:

* Pleasant eye candy graphics
* Track your High Score (points and time)
* Timer. Compare previous records
* Classic Solitar experience
* Simple - just play
* User friendly
* Completely free
